物品-药膏: 蛇毒解药：涂抹于蛇咬伤口，可吸出毒液（额外豁免机会） Asp Foiler: Applied to Snakebite, draws out Venom (extra Save)
蝙蝠盲药：一小时内对回声定位无法察觉 Bat Blinder: Imperceptible to Echolocation for an Hour

主教油：缓解因频繁跪拜或跑步引起的腿部酸痛 Bishop Oil: Eases Aches in Legs from Frequent Kneeling or Running

斗篷膏：修补厚实织物上的小裂口或撕裂，并使该区域染成黑色 Cloak Plaster: Mends small Tears/Rips in thicker Fabrics, stains area Black

鸭膏：涂抹后皮肤上凝结水珠，若食用：可防止回声 Duck Paste: Water/Moisture Beads on Skin, if eaten: Prevents Echoes
